column1:
1. Must have a personal relationship with Jesus Christ that is a consistent testimony among others
2. Agree to uphold Valley Christian’s Mission & Beliefs which can be found at http://valleychristianaz.org/about/philosophy/
3. Agree to uphold Valley Christian’s Statement of Faith
4. Faithfully attend and financially support a local church whose beliefs are in agreement with our school’s Mission & Beliefs.
5. Adheres to and honors Valley Christians standards, policies, procedures as outlined in the Employee Handbook
...
